header.title: FTP addon for attachment function
header.description: This MOD adds FTP functions to save attachment at another server.
header.author-notes: this MOD will slowdown the posting and viewtopic page, when using attachments.

Fix issue about attachment in private messages
Now thumbnail is well removed from local server
Fixed several bugs from the development
Made the MOD working on phpBB 3.0.4 (Should still work with earlier releases)
